title: Unblock Card After False Fraud Alert
description: A customer's card was blocked due to a suspected fraudulent transaction which the customer confirms was legitimate.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer and identify the transaction that triggered the fraud alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the customer and identifies the $500 online purchase.

tasks.description: Confirm with the customer that the transaction was legitimate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer confirms they made the purchase. Agent marks the alert as a false positive.

tasks.description: Remove the block from the customer's card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully unblocks the card, making it available for immediate use.
